■Remove patties three at a 
time from front to back.
■Don't cut the meat juices
when removing.
■Handle the 1/14th patties
carefully so they don't break.

■Wipe the spatula with a dry wipe
after each use and put it back
into the special holder.
■Protect the rotation and put it
back in the designated place.

■Removal time is 15s (when
cooking six layers).
■The maximum number of patties
that can be in the UHC is 12
(3 columns, 4 rows).
